page.title: 18THE 3 COUNTIES SHOW, MALVERN
page.content: The show lasts for three days in June and for 1983-5 has attracted just over {100,000 visitors each year.}It displays the latest developments in {agriculture, horticulture and {education in farming.}The livestock includes beef and dairy cattle, sheep, horses, pigs and goats. The total area is{200 acres,}68 of which are the showground with many{permanent {buildings}such as banks, veterinary surgeries, bars, telephone boxes and stock sheds. Nearby{Langdale Wood}is a site showing forestry improvements. Other activities such as dog and flower shows, antique fairs, pony club events and caravan rallies mean that the showground is{in use for about 180 {days a year.}At other times the pasture is let out for grazing cattle and sheep. Attached to the showground is a permanent{caravan touring site.
